name: Spartan: Total Warrior
description:
Spartan: Total Warrior is an action game developed by Creative Assembly. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Spartan: Total Warrior on Xbox, GameCube and PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Jonathan Court, Luci Black and Moran Paldi. Jeff van Dyck scored the game.
